title: Usher and Harry Belafonte talk activism in joint appearance
text: BING NEWS: Usher and Harry Belafonte talk activism in joint appearance NEW YORK (AP) - As he considered his growing commitment to activism, Usher only needed to look at the man seated next to him, Harry Belafonte, to know how much more he could give.
